newsitem.title: HONG KONG: First Pac in US$250 mln convertible bonds.
newsitem.headline: First Pac in US$250 mln convertible bonds.

text.p: First Pacific Co Ltd said on Monday it plans to issue in excess of US$250 million in convertible bonds for general funding puroposes.
SBC Warburg and ING Barings have been appointed advisors fo the exercise, it said in a statement.
The terms of the bonds would be determined following a book-building and marketing roadshow, the company said, adding the proceeds would be used to repay short-term borrowings.
The company announced net profit of US$204.2 million for calendar 1996, down 20.5 percent from US$257.0 million a year earlier.
But attributable profit before net exceptional items rose 32 percent to HK$1.57 billion (US$202 million) from HK$1.19 billion (US$153 million) in 1995, it said.
